
#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;


int main(){
    int  t;
    cin>>t;

while(t--){
    long int decimalNumber,remainder,quotient;

    int binaryNumber[100],i=0,j,cnt=0;

    scanf("%ld",&decimalNumber);


    quotient = decimalNumber;


    while(quotient!=0){

         binaryNumber[i]= quotient % 2;

     if(binaryNumber[i]==0)
        cnt++;
        else
            break;


         quotient = quotient / 2;

         i++;


    }


/*
    for(j = i -1 ;j>= 0;j--)

         printf("%d\n",binaryNumber[j]); */

         cout<<cnt<<endl;
         cnt=0;



}


    return 0;

}
